meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tim Casey Michael Aronson Mark Stitham Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #630.

div.div: J! round and 17 clues of DJ! round only.

td.p: Tim Casey, a graphic artist from St. Paul, Minnesota
Michael Aronson, a graduate student from Needham, Massachusetts
Mark Stitham, a physician from Kailua, Hawaii (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,100)

tr.td: SOUTH AMERICA
MACY'S PARADE
ANAGRAMS
MOVIES
LOVE & MARRIAGE
AROUND THE HOUSE

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Tim: Uh, what is coal?)
(Michael: What is wood?)

steam

MarkMichaelTim
')
